00054 void
00055 GenericCrossbar::setup (uint p, uint v)
00056 {
00057     vcs = v;
00058     input_ports =p;
00059     output_ports =p;
00060 
00061     map.resize ( vcs );
00062     busy.resize ( vcs );
00063 
00064     for ( uint i = 0; i < vcs ; i++)
00065     { 
00066         map[i].resize( input_ports );
00067         busy[i].resize( output_ports );
00068     }
00069 
00070     for ( uint i = 0; i < vcs ; i++)
00071         for ( uint j = 0; j < input_ports ; j++ )
00072         {
00073             map[i][j] = 0;
00074             busy[i][j] = false;
00075         } 
00076 
00077     return ;
00078 }               /* -----  end of method GenericCrossbar::set_no_channels  ----- */
00079 
00080 uint
00081 GenericCrossbar::get_no_channels ()
00082 {
00083     return map.size();
00084 }               /* -----  end of method GenericCrossbar::get_no_channels  ----- */
00085 
00086 uint
00087 GenericCrossbar::get_map ( uint port, uint ch)
00088 {
00089    
00090     if ( port >= input_ports )
00091     {
00092         cout << "Tried to get the mapping from input port " << port << " but the crossbar only has "  << input_ports << " input ports.\n";
00093         cout << " Need to throw an invalid port exception " << endl;
00094     }
00095     return map[ch][port];
00096 }               /* -----  end of method GenericCrossbar::get_map  ----- */
00097 
00098 void
00099 GenericCrossbar::configure_crossbar ( uint inport, uint outport, uint och )
00100 {
00101     map[och][outport] = inport;
00102     busy[och][outport] = true;
00103     return ;
00104 }               /* -----  end of method GenericCrossbar::configure_crossbar  ----- */
00105 
00106 void
00107 GenericCrossbar::push ( uint outport, uint och)
00108 {
00109     busy[och][outport] = true;
00110     return ;
00111 }               /* -----  end of method GenericCrossbar::push  ----- */
00112 
00113 void
00114 GenericCrossbar::pull ( uint outport, uint och )
00115 {
00116     busy[och][outport] = false;
00117     return ;
00118 }               /* -----  end of method GenericCrossbar::pull  ----- */
00119 
00120 bool
00121 GenericCrossbar::is_full ( uint inport, uint och )
00122 {
00123     for ( uint i=0; i<busy.size(); i++)
00124         if ( map[och][i] == inport)
00125             return true;
00126 
00127     return false;
00128 }               /* -----  end of method GenericCrossbar::full  ----- */
00129 
00130 bool
00131 GenericCrossbar::is_empty ( uint oport, uint ch )
00132 {
00133     if( ch>= busy.size() )
00134         cout << "Invalid channel " << endl;
00135 
00136     if(oport >= busy[0].size())
00137         cout << "Invalid output port" << busy[0].size() << endl;
00138 
00139     return !busy[ch][oport];
00140 }               /* -----  end of method GenericCrossbar::is_port_empty  ----- */

00142 string
00143 GenericCrossbar::toString () const
00144 {
00145     stringstream str;
00146     str << "GenericCrossbar"
00147         << "\t channels: " << map.size()
00148         << "\t ports: " << map[0].size()
00149         << "\t output_ports: " << output_ports
00150         << endl;
00151     return str.str();
00152 }               /* -----  end of function GenericCrossbar::toString  ----- */
